intro: Use your staff to solve challenging puzzles and unlock powerful spells by absorbing energy from rare magic crystals.
description:
Play the well-known 3-piece alignment game of the same color, but with totally different mechanics;
Have fun in a Building block-style VOXEL setting;
Solve challenging puzzles in a unique way, interacting with the scenario using the resources acquired during the game.

THE FANTASTIC WORLD OF MAGICOLORS

It is a board game where a Mage uses the power of his staff to collect the energy of the magic crystals scattered throughout the scene.
The objective is to make the collecting spell pass through 3 crystals of the same color in a row. Other spells will be unlocked when the player collects the amount of crystal energy needed to obtain each spell.

The player must use the new spells creatively to solve new and challenging puzzles as he progresses on his journey.

BOARD ON THIS JOURNEY!

You are a sorcerer who, to improve himself in the art of magic, starts a challenging journey. Using the power of your staff and the ability to solve puzzles, you will acquire the energy of rare crystals and unlock powerful spells.
 A PUZZLE GAME LIKE NO OTHER ...

This game uses the well-known theme of aligning 3 pieces of the same color, but with a totally different mechanics. Using a 3D scenario (Voxel Art), challenge the player to solve the puzzles in a unique way. By positioning the character in the right place and firing the acquired powers at the right angle, the game allows interaction with the scenario and the collection of the Energy of the Colored Crystals and, thus, advance to the next phases.
